# setTriangleFillMode(_:)

**Instance Method**

Configures how subsequent draw commands rasterize triangle and triangle strip primitives.

## Declaration

```swift
func setTriangleFillMode(_ fillMode: MTLTriangleFillMode)
```

## Parameters

- **fillMode**: A triangle filling mode the render pass applies to draw commands that rasterize triangles or triangle strips.

## Discussion

The render pass’s default mode is [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLTriangleFillMode/fill].

## Configuring rendering behavior

- **setFrontFacing(_:)**: Configures which face of a primitive, such as a triangle, is the front.
- **setCullMode(_:)**: Configures how the render pipeline determines which primitives to remove.
